#Text=The Dallas Mavericks ( 32 - 17 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 8 - 39 ) 100 - 94 on Monday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas .
#Text=The Mavericks came out and had a strong start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 30 - 20 in the first quarter alone .

#Text=The Mavericks shot better as a team , going 46 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Wolves went 42 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc .
#Text=The Timberwolves did secure a 47 - 43 rebounding advantage , but it was n't enough to take down the Mavericks .
#Text=Monta Ellis had the most production for the Mavericks , finishing with 23 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 11 FT ) , two assists and two steals in 36 minutes .
#Text=He 's had two impressive games in a row , combining for 48 points , 15 assists and five steals over that span .
#Text=Chandler Parsons was also extremely effective , as he had his shot dialed in .
#Text=He went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding six rebounds and four steals .
#Text=The four steals were a new season - high for him , as he was productive on both sides of the ball Monday .
#Text=Dirk Nowitzki was very efficient in his time on the floor , scoring 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and grabbing seven rebounds .
#Text=He 's scored 14 points or less in each of his last four games , so it was good to see him start trending back towards his season - average of 18 points per game .
#Text=Starting in place of Rajon Rondo , Jose Barea added 10 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight assists .
#Text=In his fourth game back since returning from his lengthy wrist injury , Kevin Martin scored a team - high of 19 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 38 minutes .
#Text=During those four games he 's averaged 18 points , so he 's nearing a return to the form he was in before the injury .
#Text=Thaddeus Young nearly recorded a double - double , posting 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds and three steals .
#Text=He 's turned it on during his last two games , combining for 34 points and 12 rebounds .
#Text=Andrew Wiggins did n't necessarily have his best showing from the field , finishing only 4 - of - 14 from the floor to score 14 points .
#Text=He just posted 33 points on Saturday , so it was somewhat of a letdown for him .
#Text=The biggest storyline of the night for the Timberwolves though was the return of Ricky Rubio .
#Text=He moved right back into the starting lineup and posted 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , three rebounds and four assists in only 21 minutes .
#Text=It was expected he 'd be on a minutes restriction , so it 's no surprise he played such a small portion of time .
#Text=Mo Williams added 15 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) and five assists off the bench as well .
#Text=The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday .
